author: Duplicate ursschretzmeier
post_text: March 8, 2012 at 11:45 AM#1Hi there,i want to create macro to copy a bunch of presets from 1 to another group. But it just didnt work for me....It should look like this:setvar $presettype =("Presettype")Setvar $preset1 = ("preset")Group 901at Preset $presettype.$preset1group 900 at group 901store /m preset $presettype.$preset1clearThis all works for me here... But i´d like it to have like this...:setvar $presettype =("Presettype")Setvar $preset1 = ("preset1")Group 901at Preset $presettype.$preset1group 900 at group 901store /m preset $presettype.$preset1clearGroup 901at Preset $presettype.$preset1 +1group 900 at group 901store /m preset $presettype.$preset1 +1clear...Or better to have it like a range "from..to"Is it possible to give a range from preset x to y and to stop there?urs
title: Preset Copy macro
